ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the last 2 weeks, I have concealed my sexual orientation by telling someome that I was straight or denying that I was LGB
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

ElementDescription: In the last 2 weeks, I have concealed my sexual orientation by avoiding contact with other LGB individuals
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

ElementDescription: In the last 2 weeks, I have avoided the subjects of sex, love, attraction, or relationships to conceal my sexual orientation
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

ElementDescription: In the last 2 weeks, I have allowed others to assume I am straight without correcting them
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

ElementDescription: In the last 2 weeks, I have altered my appearance, mannerisms, or activities in an attempt to ''pass'' as straight
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

ElementDescription: In the last 2 weeks, I have remained silent while witnessing anti-gay remarks, jokes, or activities because I did not want to be labeled as LGB by those involved
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

ElementDescription: Use the following scale to indicate how much you are out of the closet about your LGBTQ+ identity to the following groups of people in your life: Parents/Caregivers
Notes: 1 = Out to none; 2 = Out to some; 3 = Out to most; 4 = Out to all; 99 = N/A

ElementDescription: Use the following scale to indicate how much you are out of the closet about your LGBTQ+ identity to the following groups of people in your life: Siblings
Notes: 1 = Out to none; 2 = Out to some; 3 = Out to most; 4 = Out to all; 99 = N/A

ElementDescription: Use the following scale to indicate how much you are out of the closet about your LGBTQ+ identity to the following groups of people in your life: LGBTQ+ friends
Notes: 1 = Out to none; 2 = Out to some; 3 = Out to most; 4 = Out to all; 99 = N/A

ElementDescription: Use the following scale to indicate how much you are out of the closet about your LGBTQ+ identity to the following groups of people in your life: Cisgender, straight/heterosexual friends
Notes: 1 = Out to none; 2 = Out to some; 3 = Out to most; 4 = Out to all; 99 = N/A

ElementDescription: Use the following scale to indicate how much you are out of the closet about your LGBTQ+ identity to the following groups of people in your life: Coworkers or other peers
Notes: 1 = Out to none; 2 = Out to some; 3 = Out to most; 4 = Out to all; 99 = N/A

ElementDescription: Use the following scale to indicate how much you are out of the closet about your LGBTQ+ identity to the following groups of people in your life: Teachers or bosses
Notes: 1 = Out to none; 2 = Out to some; 3 = Out to most; 4 = Out to all; 99 = N/A

ElementDescription: In the past 30days, I have concealed my sexual orientation by telling someone that I was straight or denying my sexuality
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, I have concealed my sexual orientation by avoiding contact with other LGBQIA+ individuals
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time

Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Very much; 5 = All the time
